clues.description: Find the red bridge in a foggy city.
A famous tower with twinkling lights every evening.
A majestic white marble mausoleum built by an emperor.
A famous opera house with a sail-like design.
The city of cherry blossoms and neon lights.
Look for the Christ statue overlooking the city.
A towering symbol of the Big Apple.
A city of seven hills and ancient ruins.
Find the colorful domes in the heart of Russia.
Search for the tallest building in the world.
